title: Lenovo G510 - AMD Radeon R5 M230 "Unknown directx error"
body:
Hello,

I have a problem with my Lenovo G510 Laptop. 
I have Intel 4600 Graphics and AMD Radeon R5 M230 graphic card on this one. 

When I install Intel drivers: I got "unknown directx error..." communicate when I try to launch the game (I mean after choosing the champion, loading screen crashes).

When I install AMD drivers: I got the same problem as with Intel drivers.

When I first install Intel drivers, then AMD drivers: loading screen to the match launches and then instantly I got bluescreen and computer restarts.

Did anyone had problem like this? Does anyone have an idea how to solve it? I spent 2 days already trying to solve this and I'm losing hope... tried everything. 

AND YES: I have all net.framework, directx etc. installed and updated. I got brand new client so deleting config can't help, I tried it. I reinstalled client many times already.

replies.body: You could be having some serious driver or hardware failure if you're getting these blue screens.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our tech team can do anything.  It would also help a lot if you're able to attach some logs to the ticket, which can be obtained through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
